gateway.title: API Gateway
gateway.description:
The primary layer responsible for proxying API requests to agency APIs.

Issues here would affect the ability for API users to call agency APIs.

api.title: API Key Signup
api.description:
The APIs used for registering new API keys.

Issues here would affect the ability for new users to signup for API keys (but existing users should not be impacted).

admin.title: Admin & Admin APIs
admin.description:
The api.data.gov admin, and the associated APIs that the admin tool uses.

Issues here would affect api.data.gov admins only.
